content: I received my bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (UCAS) in 2020. Currently, I am a Master’s student at VIPL Group, Institute of Computing Technology (ICT), Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) , supervised by Prof. Shiguang Shan and Prof. Jiabei Zeng. I will start my Ph.D. at Multimedia Laboratory (MMLab) of The Chinese University of Hong Kong in Fall 2023, supervised by Prof. Tianfan Xue.
